subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Joaquin Rodríguez won the tough 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia on Wednesday to keep his 30-second lead in the overall standings.
snippet: Joaquin Rodríguez won the tough 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia on Wednesday to keep his 30-second lead in the overall standings.
